wake: You look around at the smouldering remains of your ship..
This will do as a shelter for a while, but you can't stay here forever if you want to get home..

search.alreadySearched: You've already looked around, there's nothing else to find.
search.food: You go searching nearby, and find something that looks edible.
search.water: You go searching nearby, and find a clear liquid. It looks like water, and turns out, it is.
search.nothing: You go searching nearby, and find nothing of value..

quit: You need to rest.. It's been a long day..
